posts.title: Task July, 26 2023
posts.body:
1. Mail to HR regarding salary slips.
2. Call For Scaler Community Support.
3. Integrate Custom Hooks, Context API, and Redux using Easy-Peasy.
4. Create JS Project with Chai aur Code.
5. Revision (3, 4).
6. Learn DSA concepts with questions.
7. Complete GCP labs.
8. Learn CSS styling.
9. Learn Salesforce Developer.
10. Revise (6 to 9).
11. Read 80-20 principles by Dev Gadhvi (30 pages).
12. Learn SQL.
